channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Seeing Greene: Should I Start Flipping Houses in My Market? (How to Know)
item.description: Should I pay off my rentals or scale to more doors? Should I start flipping houses in my local but expensive market or go long-distance? When is the time to […]

item.title: GM’s Cruise abandons Origin robotaxi, takes $583 million charge
item.description: GM’s self-driving car subsidiary Cruise is scrapping plans to build the Origin — a purpose-built robotaxi with no steering wheel or pedals — and will instead use the next-generation Chevrolet Bolt in its operations. GM Chair and CEO Mary Barra told shareholders Tuesday the decision will “simplify their path to scale” and addresses the regulatory […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Five Things to Know About Kamala Harris’ Criminal Justice Record
item.description: Here’s where Vice President Kamala Harris, a former prosecutor, stands on important criminal justice issues.

item.title: 2 Money Moves We’re Making TODAY to Prepare for a Potential Recession
item.description: Are we in a recession? Are we headed for a recession? No one knows for certain, but you can never be too prepared for an economic downturn. Are you saving […]

item.title: Hackers shut down heating in Ukrainian city with malware, researchers say
item.description: Cybersecurity firm Dragos and Ukrainian authorities found a cyberattack targeting critical infrastructure in Lviv. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Project 2025 Plans for Trump to Have Unprecedented Power Over the Justice Department
item.description: The policy plan for a second Trump term would turn the department against progressive local prosecutors.

item.title: Here’s Why Real Estate Investors Are Turning to ATMs For Diversification
item.description: As real estate conditions continue to tighten, investors are turning to ATMs for steady cash flow.

item.title: Telegram’s userbase climbs to 950M, plans to launch app store
item.description: Messaging app Telegram has reached 950M active users, and it aims to cross the 1 billion mark this year, founder Pavel Durov said. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Jules and Samantha
item.description: Jules and Samantha Werkheiser fought their wrongful convictions for over a decade. Here’s their journey of survival — and motherhood — in pictures.

item.title: Month Seven of Our 1031 Exchange: We’re Investing in… Restaurants?
item.description: With $975,000 to play with, we're looking at options outside of residential real estate.

item.title: India scraps ‘angel tax’ in boost for startups
item.description: India’s federal government has removed the so-called “angel tax” for all classes of investors, delivering a major victory to the country’s startup ecosystem that had lobbied for years against the measure. “To bolster the India startup ecosystem, to boost entrepreneurial spirit and support innovation, I propose abolishing angel tax for all classes of investors,” Finance […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meet the New Generation of Unarmed First Responders in This New Podcast Series
item.description: “The Fifth Branch,” a podcast from The Marshall Project and Tradeoffs, examines new, alternative ways to respond to 911 crisis calls.

item.title: The Department of Justice’s Next Target: Buyer Agents
item.description: The DOJ is planning further changes to agent commission structures, which could lead to a significant reduction in traditional commission rates.

item.title: Kakao founder issued arrest warrant by Seoul court
item.description: A Seoul court issued an arrest warrant for Brian Kim, the founder of South Korean internet giant Kakao, on allegations of stock price manipulation related to the company’s takeover of K-pop agency SM Entertainment in 2023. The Seoul Southern District Court said on Tuesday that it had issued a warrant for Kim’s arrest after a […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What We Know About J.D. Vance’s Legislative Action on Criminal Justice
item.description: On immigration and more, Vance has defended and legislated former President Donald Trump’s policy goals.
